CustomField.formula: (IF( ISPICKVAL( Proper_Greeting__c , "Pass") || ISPICKVAL(Proper_Greeting__c, "N/A") , 1, 0 ) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Proper_Spelling_of_Cuustomer_Name_Email__c , "Pass") || ISPICKVAL( Proper_Spelling_of_Cuustomer_Name_Email__c , "N/A") , 1, 0) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Thanking_Customer__c , "Pass") || ISPICKVAL(Thanking_Customer__c, "N/A") , 1, 0)) / 3
CustomField.label: Opening Total % (Email)
